project.title: Welcome to Scene Chunks!
project.logline: A quick tour of the interface.

body.text:
Welcome! This is a sample scene chunk.
        
Scene Chunks lets you build your screenplay as modular pieces (‚Äúchunks‚Äù). 
Each chunk contains action, dialogue, transitions, and tags you can rearrange at any time.

left.dialogue:
‚Ä¢ The sidebar lists all your scenes  
 
‚Ä¢ The bottom bar shows your script structure  

‚Ä¢ The Writer button will remove distractions and let you get in the zone

right.dialogue:
‚Ä¢ The editor shows the selected scene 

‚Ä¢ Panels on the side handle Characters, Props, & Crew

‚Ä¢ And when you're ready to see your masterpiece, click the Preview Button.

body.text: üëâ When you're ready, delete this chunk or click **BLANK PROJECT** to start fresh.

body.dialogue: This demo chunk exists only to show the interface. Feel free to delete it.
